text: Belite Orli Pleven () is a Bulgarian football club from the town of Pleven, currently playing in the A RFG Pleven, the fourth division of Bulgarian football. The team dissolved in 2010, but restored in 2014. ==History== ===Foundation=== On 19 August 1931 in Pleven is founded the football club Belite Orleta. The team name is changed to Belite Orli in 1932. In 1942 they are allowed to build own stadium called Spartak, but later the name is changed to Belite Orli Stadium. In 1947 team is merged with the other Pleven football clubs to found one united team called PFC Spartak Pleven. ===1991–2010=== On 20 January 1991 the team is refounded by Viktor Haidukov, son of one of the original founders and others. Team is led by association Sport Club Belite Orli. Team had 8 seasons in the Bulgarian 2nd league B Group, before was dissolved in 2010 due to financial problems. ===2014–present=== The team is ones again refounded in 2014 and started from the fifth league of Bulgaria the B Regional Group. The team promoted to A Regional Group in the first season. For the 2014–15 season Svetoslav Barkanichkov was appointed as manager hoping to manage the team to the V Group. ==Honours== *B RFG Pleven: ** Winners (1): 2014–15 ==Players== ==Managers== {| class="wikitable" |- !Dates !Name !Honours |- |2015–2016 | Svetoslav Barkanichkov | |} ==Past seasons== {| class="wikitable" width="800px" |- ! style="background:#ABCDEF;" | Season ! style="background:#ABCDEF;" | League ! style="background:#ABCDEF;" | Place ! style="background:#ABCDEF;" | W ! style="background:#ABCDEF;" | D ! style="background:#ABCDEF;" | L ! style="background:#ABCDEF;" | GF ! style="background:#ABCDEF;" | GA ! style="background:#ABCDEF;" | Pts ! style="background:#ABCDEF;" | Bulgarian Cup |- align="center" style="background:#ccffcc;" |2014–15||B RFG Pleven (V) || 1 || 17 || 2 || 1 || 73 || 14 || 53 || not qualified |- align="center" |2015–16||A RFG Pleven (IV) || – || – || – || – || – || – || – || not qualified |- | colspan="12" align="center" | Green marks a season followed by promotion, red a season followed by relegation. |} ==External links== * Български клубове – Белите орли (Плевен) * Белите орли (Плевен) Belite orli Category:1931 establishments in Bulgaria Category:2010 disestablishments in Bulgaria Category:2014 establishments in Bulgaria Category:Pleven
